extendedInfo.description: For A Limited Time Only Get the Full Version 33% OFF the Price!Here Comes the next update= Hopefully on great performance FIX!+ small graphic update.Here Comes the next update= Hopefully on great performance FIX!As One of our loyal user requested here comes simple menu + an extra car for the demo , note that FULL version will get more cars than 2 and it alerdy has 5 cars for now! :)Fixed Sudden drifts in the middle of going highspeed.Ever Wanted To Just Freeroam/race with some of most basic cars while waiting for something!?well wait no more ExO Drive Gives full freeroam ability + Career mod And race's at future updates!With your support for our 1 Man Team you will help me build & make the game smoother and betterPlease Lets me know every bug and issue you find, ill be sure to try to fix them!

reviews.title: Read please
reviews.comment: Needs real controls, different camera options, another map on lite version. But other than that its a good game
reviews.author: Tyler Winter

reviews.title: Good but....
reviews.comment: Can you a real steering then five star
reviews.author: George Taylor

reviews.title: Has Potential
reviews.comment: I see this as a game in the making. I like it and hope for better and new graphics and options. One of the primary reasons for downloading was because the R34 was playable and most games don\'t have that. I think you just need more time and work a little harder. Maybe add The R32 and 33. If this is a one man team then you\'ve been doing great!
reviews.author: Jordan Choong Ayala

reviews.title: This game is AWESOME but
reviews.comment: This is the most awesomest game i have ever played but can u put a real controls PLEASE!
reviews.author: Eliyah Barclay

reviews.title: ExO drive demo
reviews.comment: R34 graphic need to be repair.I will give five star
reviews.author: halim daud

reviews.title: First person
reviews.comment: Can you make for this lite and also full version has cameras and first person cam if theres a fps cam it would be so cooooollll!!!!!

reviews.title: FIX!!!!
reviews.comment: It lags to much! I use like this game. I\'ll LOVE IT if you put more levels/street on to it and street lights!

reviews.comment: Please add drifting

reviews.title: HP Slate 7
reviews.comment: Great game but the FPS when using the Skyline drops by 90% Please fix this and then its a 100% worth buying game
reviews.author: Jakub Sobczak

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: The car model is extremely good... but the world around it is not so good. To name this a great game you have to buckle down on both graphics and gameplay. Not trying to be mean just giving a few tips! But great start!
reviews.author: Jacin Luongo

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: Good idea car models are good, but for a Samsung galaxy note 2 with quad core to have lagg isnt right, plus sound of the car isnt coming up either.
reviews.author: Aaron Kearns

reviews.title: Unacceptable by Arahan
reviews.comment: The camera on demo car R34 isn\'t working. Please fix the camera for demo car R34. The other demo car Cooper was working propaly.

reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work to many glitches for now 1 star just because I can not give it 0 stars need better control over the car roads need to be completed car floats when it should be going down a hill

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome and fun game,but can you fix the AI cars because they just come back where they spawn,and fix the void problem, please???I put five (5) stars if both problem are fixed.
